unit.desc: They give away tickets for Roller Derby at the organic juice store!

unit.name: Steve Smith
unit.desc: A legend in my own mind... And in a card game.

unit.name: Antichrist
unit.desc: Condemn them Mother, for they know exactly what they do!

unit.name: Samurai Toshi
unit.desc: Abba-Zabba!

unit.name: Beerwater
unit.desc: You can lead a horse to water but you can't make him party.

unit.name: Turnin Jeff
unit.desc: I know I hallucinated it, and it doesn't exist, but the Turin is real!

unit.name: Stan's Haunted House
unit.desc: Now featuring real serial killers!

unit.name: Deers with Guns
unit.desc: Dad, I'd like you meet your grandchildren.

unit.name: Professor Baxter
unit.desc: Heads up, I might be changing it back to Professor Guggenheim.

unit.name: Rubberneckers
unit.desc: A peek don't hurt, if you wanna scout skirt, you'll have to be covert.

unit.name: Roger's Sexy Shorts
unit.desc: Maybe too sexy?

unit.desc: Enough talk, let's wrestle!

unit.name: Snot Rocket
unit.desc: If you wrestle him, you have to touch him.

unit.name: Candy Cane Gun
unit.desc: I'll see you in Hell, Stan.

unit.name: Painter Klaus
unit.desc: It's a masterpiece.

unit.name: Stan's Grill
unit.desc: Check out my grill, courtesy of Max Jets!

unit.name: Banker Roger
unit.desc: You should trust me with your money. I'm not wearing pants.

unit.name: Hipster Donald
unit.desc: You get the drift, I win.

unit.name: Lounge Singer Hayley
unit.desc: When she shimmies, her boobs are kind of all over the place.

unit.name: Rocker Bullock
unit.desc: A superstorm of hot licks!

unit.name: Valik
unit.desc: The boy is to die first!

unit.name: Soda Chugging Francine
unit.desc: Buuuuuuuuuuurp!

unit.name: Babylegs Stan
unit.desc: Don't worry, they'll grow to full size but it takes a few hours.

unit.name: Drunk Stan
unit.desc: We're going to drink this and then we're going to jump off the roof.

unit.name: Daddy's Gone
unit.desc: Daddy's gone. And we're not going home ever again.

unit.name: High Legman
unit.desc: What did you do to my legs, you nazi walrus bastard?

unit.name: Prof Max Hammer
unit.desc: My job is to save the world... from Mexican Vampires!

unit.name: Kidney Killer
unit.desc: Oooh I think I had too much. One more? Probably a bad idea. I'm… in a lot of pain.

unit.name: Spaceship Pilot
unit.desc: I'll drop you off, then armageddon outta here!

unit.name: Helicopter Stan
unit.desc: I swear to God I will never hurt you.

unit.name: Squirrel Suit Hayley
unit.desc: Nuts from above!

unit.name: Flying Dream Sequence
unit.desc: I can see our house from here.

unit.name: Sexy Cowardly Lion Stan
unit.desc: Everyone does the sexy thing, it's so played out.

unit.name: Stewardess Francine
unit.desc: Those are my two favorite words. Tiny pillow fight!

unit.name: Masked Hero
unit.desc: The night belongs to me!

unit.name: Space Steve
unit.desc: Prepare olfactory system for flatulence.

unit.name: Space Stan
unit.desc: If you want to check out my meatballs, go right ahead.

unit.name: Legman
unit.desc: Tell this kid to hit the bricks.

unit.name: Sword Fighter Francine
unit.desc: She's Chinese, it's part of her heritage.

unit.name: Water Gun Steve
unit.desc: Prepare to be soaked... with water.

unit.name: I Get What I Want
unit.desc: Because I'm a big spoiled baby.

unit.name: Celebeartions
unit.desc: It sounds like a cross between celibate and abortion.

unit.name: Record Holder Stan
unit.desc: This trophy is mine! You can't have it!

unit.name: Shots Francine
unit.desc: Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Dinner is at 6.

unit.name: Steve Crossing the Alps
unit.desc: Athletic, chiseled, missing.

unit.name: Moonshine Roger
unit.desc: I got a spot where no one gonna find you. Won't hear when I make ya squeal like a pig neither.

unit.name: Joystick Steve
unit.desc: My whole body is a joystick!

unit.name: Wrestler Steve
unit.desc: Ticklish! I'm ticklish! That tickles!

unit.name: Restauranteur Roger
unit.desc: No one suspects a successful restaurateur of arson.

unit.name: Roger Goes Down
unit.desc: All the hits from late '97 to early '99!

unit.name: Chex LeMeneux
unit.desc: In a game versus Sweden, I was inside one of their forwards for like a minute.

unit.name: Crack Addict Stan
unit.desc: Where can I get more crack? Need it, want it, gotta have it -- crack!

unit.name: Normal Stan
unit.desc: I like pills.

unit.name: Michael Dangle-low
unit.desc: Your daddy is a brilliant painter.

unit.name: Air Guitar Stan
unit.desc: Thank you, thank you! It's 3:48pm, the perfect time to ROCK!

unit.name: Food Restaurant Stan
unit.desc: This is a food restaurant, we don't serve salad.

unit.name: Roach Coach Stan
unit.desc: This will be our base of operations for Operation Pinch A Loaf.

unit.name: Groupie Francine
unit.desc: I'm Francine Smith, rock goddess. Try not to fall in love with me.

unit.name: Motocross Bicyclist Francine
unit.desc: So does this mean I win or...

unit.name: Roach Coach Francine
unit.desc: Necesito dos burritos de desayuno y un lado de frijoles refritos. What? You didn't know I was bilingual? What do you think I do all day?

unit.name: Roach Coach Roger
unit.desc: Two BB's and a side of fart paste coming up!

unit.name: Shots Klaus
unit.desc: Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots!

unit.name: DJ Klaus
unit.desc: What up bitches?! DJ Klaus here on the ones and twos. Please don't leave.

unit.name: Bondage Klaus
unit.desc: I know it doesn't look like it, but I'm having a blast! Had this made custom if you can believe it. If you unzip my mask, you unzip my face.

unit.name: Back to School Stan
unit.desc: What are you doing here? You're a grown man!

unit.name: Limo Driver Roger
unit.desc: It's always been a dream of mine to drive people slightly more privileged than myself to various places.

unit.name: Hungover Steve
unit.desc: Oof. Everything's kind of blurry.

unit.name: Tractor Boy
unit.desc: What's up, bitches! That's right, I got my farmer's license! First freshman to drive!

unit.name: Old Steve
unit.desc: I'm so old. Why am I still so horny? There's just something about an adding machine that's so satisfying.

unit.name: Rich Hayley
unit.desc: Let's give all our money to charity.

unit.name: Rich Francine
unit.desc: I have an alarming amount of credit card debt!

unit.name: Junk Food Klaus
unit.desc: I'm not a vet but I think you're overfeeding your fish.

unit.name: Withdrawal Steve
unit.desc: It you want to get anywhere in life, you have to wrestle.

unit.name: Model Builder Roger
unit.desc: Glue sniffing can be very calming. Like painting intricate model planes.

unit.name: Space Queen
unit.desc: Fetch your queen a choco taco most frozen.

unit.name: Winfrey
unit.desc: We fray-frays now. We best fray-frays!

unit.name: B6
unit.desc: I'm B6 I pick up sticks.

unit.name: Roger in Disguise
unit.desc: And just like that! I'm gone.

unit.name: Karate Steve
unit.desc: FUN FACT: Karate was developed on the island of Okinawa, Japan.

unit.name: Sensei Ryan
unit.desc: I lease a dojo. I sleep in a dojo. I do my cooking and laundry in a dojo. Harder! Angrier! Destroy your opponent!

unit.name: Drunk Bullock
unit.desc: Did I ever tell you about the time I murdered the Bolshoi ballet? It was also the weekend I discovered Crocs.

unit.name: Responsible Cocaine User Bullock
unit.desc: I adhere to strict rules to ensure things don't go out of control.

unit.name: Secret Asian Man

unit.name: Hoverthrone King
unit.desc: Cutbacks must be made, and it’s not going to be my throne polisher!

unit.desc: Champagne anyone?

unit.name: Furry Bullock
unit.desc: Way down deep inside we've all got a kink!

unit.desc: Yes I started collecting when I was in Vietnam, two summers ago.

unit.desc: It's time for an intervention.

unit.desc: From the episode "Father's Daze".

unit.desc: From the episode "Father's Daze".

unit.desc: Get ripped!

unit.desc: Nothing crazy about this.

unit.desc: Oh, my God-- mac and cheese. We need mac and cheese. Yes! So much yes!
